description: This file defines a Flutter widget 'CategoriesScreen' that provides a UI layout with an AppBar and centered text indicating a category spending summary screen, currently as a stub implementation.

classes.name: CategoriesScreen
classes.description: A StatelessWidget that displays a scaffold with an app bar and placeholder text for category summaries.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the CategoriesScreen, returning a Scaffold with an AppBar and centered text.
